content.raw: Thank you for creating this model.  I just tried the no roll cage version and added a comment about missing the drive shaft passage.  I just noticed another issue.  I added the model without trying to attach it to the plugin.  The steering slowly drifted to the left (minor).  When the steering was to the left, the wheel could be seen inside the vehicle just to the left of the brake pedal.  I have images of the drive shaft passage and a screenshot of the wheel inside the driver compartment.  I was unable to attach them to issue #13, but would email them if anyone would like them.
content.html: Thank you for creating this model. I just tried the no roll cage version and added a comment about missing the drive shaft passage. I just noticed another issue. I added the model without trying to attach it to the plugin. The steering slowly drifted to the left (minor). When the steering was to the left, the wheel could be seen inside the vehicle just to the left of the brake pedal. I have images of the drive shaft passage and a screenshot of the wheel inside the driver compartment. I was unable to attach them to issue #13, but would email them if anyone would like them.
